statements: UPDATE quantum_gate_operations SET gate_name='Hadamard Gate', gate_matrix='[[1, 1], [1, -1]]' WHERE gate_id=1;

UPDATE quantum_gate_operations SET gate_name = 'Hadamard Gate', gate_description = 'Produces superposition between 0 and 1 states' WHERE gate_id = 1;
